member.summary: Frontend identifier associated with this session.

member.summary: Backend identifier this client is bound to.

member.summary: Last access timestamp, in UTC time. Updated each time the session is used.

member.exception: Thrown when required parameters are null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.summary: Check if the session has expired.
member.returns: True if the session has expired, false otherwise.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.Touch(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update the last access timestamp and extend expiration if needed.
member.exception: Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.summary: Create a unique session key for storage.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the conversation/session identifier this request belongs to.

member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the backend server that handled this request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the client that initiated this request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TransformationId
member.summary: Gets or sets the transformation identifier if request/response transformation was performed.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.RequestBodySize
member.summary: Request body size in bytes. Must be non-negative.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.RequestArrivalUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the request arrived at the load balancer.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendSelectedUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when a backend server was selected to handle the request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendRequestSentUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the request was sent to the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.FirstTokenTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the first token was received from the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.LastTokenTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the last token was received from the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendSelectionTimeMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between request arrival and backend server selection. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TimeToFirstTokenMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between sending the request to backend and receiving the first token. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TimeToCompletionMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between sending the request to backend and receiving the last token. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TotalRequestTimeMs
member.summary: Gets the total end-to-end request time in milliseconds (from arrival to last token). Returns null if last token timestamp is not set.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Frontend.UseStickySessions

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Frontend.StickySessionExpirationMs
member.summary: Duration in milliseconds for how long a sticky session should remain active. Default is 1800000 milliseconds (30 minutes). Minimum is 10000 milliseconds (10 seconds). Maximum is 86400000 milliseconds (24 hours).

member.summary: Interval, in milliseconds. Default is 30000. Minimum is 5000.

member.summary: Maximum concurrent downloads per backend. Default is 3.

member.summary: Add a backend and start model synchronization for it. Only operates on Ollama backends since OpenAI/vLLM don't support runtime model pulling.

member.summary: Remove a backend and stop model synchronization for it.

member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService
member.summary: Service for managing sticky sessions between clients and backends.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.CleanupIntervalMs
member.summary: Interval in milliseconds for cleaning up expired sessions. Default is 300000 milliseconds (5 minutes). Minimum is 10000 milliseconds (10 seconds). Maximum is 3600000 milliseconds (1 hour).

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.ActiveSessionCount
member.summary: Get the total number of active sessions.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.GetStickyBackend(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the sticky backend for a client and frontend combination.
member.returns: Backend identifier if a valid sticky session exists, null otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.SetStickyBackend(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set a sticky backend for a client and frontend combination.
member.exception: Thrown when required parameters are null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.TouchSession(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Update the last access time for an existing session and extend its expiration.
member.returns: True if the session was found and updated, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.returns: True if the session was found and removed, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.

member.summary: Remove all sessions for a specific client.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveFrontendSessions(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all sessions associated with a specific frontend.
member.exception: Thrown when frontendId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveBackendSessions(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all sessions associated with a specific backend.
member.exception: Thrown when backendId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.GetAllSessions
member.returns: List of all active sticky sessions.

member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline
member.summary: Orchestrates the complete transformation pipeline for API requests and responses.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.#ctor(OllamaFlow.Core.Serialization.Serializer)
member.summary: Initialize the transformation pipeline with default transformers.
Initialize the transformation pipeline with custom transformers.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.TransformInboundAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum)
member.summary: Transform an inbound request from a specific API format to agnostic format.
member.param: The API format of the incoming request.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.TransformOutboundAsync(OllamaFlow.Core.Models.Agnostic.Base.AgnosticRequest,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum)
member.summary: Transform an agnostic request to backend-specific format.
member.param: The target API format for the backend.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.TransformResponseInboundAsync(System.Object,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum)
member.summary: Transform a backend response from a specific API format to agnostic format.
member.param: The API format of the backend response.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.TransformResponseOutboundAsync(OllamaFlow.Core.Models.Agnostic.Base.AgnosticResponse,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum)
member.summary: Transform an agnostic response to a specific client API format.
member.param: The target API format for the client.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.TransformCompleteAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum)
member.summary: Perform complete transformation pipeline: inbound agnostic outbound.
member.param: The HTTP context containing the request.
The API format of the incoming request.
The target API format for the backend.
member.returns: Transformation pipeline result containing both agnostic and backend-specific requests.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.GetStreamingTransformer
member.summary: Get the streaming transformer for handling streaming transformations.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipeline.SupportsStreamingTransformation(OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum,OllamaFlow.Core.Enums.ApiFormatEnum,OllamaFlow.Core.Helpers.RequestTypeEnum)
member.summary: Determines if streaming transformation is supported between the specified formats.
member.returns: True if streaming transformation is supported.

member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult
member.summary: Result of a complete transformation pipeline operation.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.AgnosticRequest
member.summary: The agnostic request created from the inbound transformation.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.BackendRequest
member.summary: The backend-specific request created from the outbound transformation.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.SourceFormat
member.summary: The source API format of the original request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.TargetFormat
member.summary: The target API format for the backend request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.RequestType
member.summary: The type of request that was transformed.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.TransformationId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this transformation operation.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationPipelineResult.CompletedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when the transformation was completed.

member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationCapabilities
member.summary: Represents the transformation capabilities of the pipeline.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationCapability.TransformerType
member.summary: The name of the transformer class.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationCapability.SourceFormat
member.summary: The source API format (null for outbound transformers).

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.Transformation.TransformationCapability.TargetFormat
member.summary: The target API format (null for inbound transformers).

member.summary: Enable or disable logging of queries.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Settings.LoggingSettings.LogResults
member.summary: Enable or disable logging of results.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Settings.SyslogServer.RandomizePorts
member.summary: Boolean to indicate whether or not randomized port numbers should be used. If false, the value in 'Port' will be used.
